snippet: Dr. Schuller was an apostle of positive thinking and a symbol of success for decades, before his Crystal Cathedral Ministries ran into financial troubles amid a changing religious broadcast industry.
abstract: Rev Robert H Schuller, founder of megachurch the Crystal Cathedral and influential writer and speaker on Christian faith and positive thinking, dies at age 88.

byline.contributor: William McDonald, Laurie Goodstein and Daniel E. Slotnik contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Dr. Schuller was an apostle of positive thinking and a symbol of success for decades, before his Crystal Cathedral Ministries ran into financial troubles amid a changing religious broadcast industry.

headline.main: Rev. Robert Schuller, 88, Dies; Built an Empire Preaching Self-Belief
headline.print_headline: Rev. Robert H. Schuller, 88, Dies; Preached Self-Belief From Crystal Cathedral
